readability.clarity: - Intention-revealing names - Clear function signatures - No hidden side effects - Explicit data flow
readability.structure: - Functions under 20 lines - Nesting under 3 levels - Consistent formatting - Logical grouping
readability.documentation: - Comments explain "why" - Type annotations when helpful - API documentation - Examples for complex logic

complexity.cognitive: - Single responsibility - Predictable behavior - Standard patterns - Limited scope
complexity.technical: - Simple control flows - Minimal state - Few dependencies - Deterministic output
complexity.testing: - Easy to verify - Isolated effects - Clear preconditions - Minimal edge cases
